channel.title: [Help] how do i make all teleports light up
channel.description:
how do i make all of the teleports light up even if you dont have the magic level:
like this: [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/35i94qg.png[/img]
this is not in the client! so please dont move it!

item.title: [Help] how do i make all teleports light up
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

You need a cache editor, sorry I should of been more clear about things. They are packed in the cache.

Read full topic
item.source: [Help] how do i make all teleports light up

item.title: [Help] how do i make all teleports light up
item.dc:creator: @weed4u weed4u
item.description:
@weed4u wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:6, topic:389675”][quote author=weed4u link=topic=485584.msg3558101#msg3558101 date=1302043768]

The server rights bits to the client checking to see if you have the runes or not. If you do, it lights up.

Or you can edit it client sided to always be lit up.

more information please? like where do i edit, what do i search to change the “if i have runes or not”

Replace the dimmed out teleport sprite IMAGE (not name) with the lit up IMAGE and it will load that sprite, theoretically.

There is no sprite image i looked threw it there is only one for the HOME teleport and thats lit up but i want everything elese lit up as well
[/quote]
It’s in the cache.[/quote]

its not in there i looked all over the cache
location: C:\Users****\Desktop\ Client\cache\Magic … then theirs one image (the home button in the pic above

Make them require no runes: ClickingMost.java for delta or texthandler.java

i also looked here and all of the teleports didnt require runes

item.title: [Help] how do i make all teleports light up
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“weed4u, post:4, topic:389675”][quote author=Mendorphins link=topic=485584.msg3558066#msg3558066 date=1302041616]

The server rights bits to the client checking to see if you have the runes or not. If you do, it lights up.

Or you can edit it client sided to always be lit up.

more information please? like where do i edit, what do i search to change the “if i have runes or not”

Replace the dimmed out teleport sprite IMAGE (not name) with the lit up IMAGE and it will load that sprite, theoretically.
[/quote]

There is no sprite image i looked threw it there is only one for the HOME teleport and thats lit up but i want everything elese lit up as well[/quote]
It’s in the cache.
